root.name: Rolling Thunder 2
root.description: This sequel to 1986's Rolling Thunder, you play the role of an agent working your way towards GELDRA headquarters. You are armed only with a handgun with limited ammo, which can be replenished by entering doors or even upgraded if you find the right door.This game adds co-operative mode which its predecessor lacked. Now two players can play simultaneously, with one player being a female agent named Leila and the other player controlling the male agent "Albatross".
